title: Analysts revamp Nvidia, AI rival price targets as new business model grows
text:
Sunny. High around 75F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.. Clear to partly cloudy. Low 52F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Updated: March 30, 2024 @ 12:24 pm   Nvidia  (NVDA)  shares moved higher again Thursday, setting up the stock for its first-ever move past $900, as analysts continue to reprice the chipmaker amid a surge in AI demand and its commanding market leadership. Nvidia, now the world's third-largest stock by market value and within touching distance of Apple's $2.6 trillion, smashed Wall Street's elevated fourth quarter earnings estimates last month and forecast 2024 sales in the region of $24 billion and an implied bottom line of $5.41 per share.
